function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Paucity of good quality data on UV-C irradiation of SARS-CoV-1, SARS-CoV-2, and MERS-CoV in the air","Impact":"Limited understanding of effective UV-C irradiation for airborne coronaviruses, potentially leading to inadequate mitigation strategies","Mitigation":"Conduct further experimental studies to gather more data on UV-C irradiation of airborne coronaviruses","Technologies":"UV-C irradiation systems, experimental laboratory setups","People":"Research scientists, public health authorities","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Uncertainty about the validity of using Z value for MHV coronavirus as a surrogate for SARS-CoV-2 in air","Impact":"Potential misrepresentation of UV susceptibility, leading to ineffective upper-room UVGI installations","Mitigation":"Conduct specific studies to determine the accurate Z value for SARS-CoV-2 in air","Technologies":"Laboratory experiments, data analysis tools","People":"Research scientists, engineers, public health authorities","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Modeling expected and worst-case scenarios for upper-room UVGI installations","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of the actual effectiveness of the UVGI system","Mitigation":"Conduct extensive simulations and empirical studies to validate the performance of the UVGI system","Technologies":"Simulation software, UV-C measurement tools","People":"Research scientists, engineers, building managers","Owner":"Research institutions, building owners"}]}
